product_name: oZoboards 806 Crossover Stand Up Paddleboard and Paddle - 8' 6"
long_description: Ideal for kids and small adults learning to paddle, the 8 ft. 6 in. oZoboards 806 Crossover Stand Up Paddleboard with paddle features a soft outer skin and a 25 in. width for high maneuverability. EPS Core with triple stringers provides high strength and excellent rigidity; soft skin provides comfort for all skill levels of riders. The raised platform deck provides extra flotation and solid grip when paddling, kneeling and standing, and the soft deck doesn't hurt when you fall. 8 ft. 6 in. length is easy to turn in waves, and offers enough stability for flatwater exploration. Enhanced nose kick makes the board more forgiving in rough water and on those late drops in the surf. Fin box, carry handle and leash plug are molded into the internal structure of the high density foam core for greater strength and durability. Roughly 17 lb. weight makes it easy to transport board, even for kids. Ideal for youth riders to 120 lbs. but the oZoboard 86 Stand Up Paddleboard is also rated for skilled riders up to 150 lbs in waves or flatwater. Includes adjustable paddle and a double-swivel leash.
short_description: Ideal for kids and small adults learning to paddle, the 8 ft. 6 in. oZoboards 806 Crossover Stand Up Paddleboard with paddle features a soft outer skin and a 25 in. width for high maneuverability.
